Pre-Game Insights: India have done well in the ICC T20 World Cup, winning three out of their four matches.
India have clicked as a unit with the likes of Virat Kohli and Arshdeep Singh standing out with the bat and ball, respectively.
India are expected to secure a place in the semi-finals as the group toppers.
Zimbabwe have blown hot and cold in the tournament and will start as underdogs.
Zimbabwe will rely on their pace attack to try and secure a surprise win.
Both teams are eyeing a crucial win, making it a competitive match.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The 42nd match of the ICC Men's T20 World Cup 2022 will be played on November 6 at the MCG.
The game is set to take place at 1:30 PM IST.
The pitch at the MCG is a decent one to bat on with the average score being 160.
Most of the scheduled matches at the venue have been impacted by rain but the pacers have enjoyed the conditions, picking up over 60 percent of the wickets.
Chasing could be the preferred option, with the pitch not likely to change much during the course of the game.
